entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 8 with temperature rising to 15 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h this evening. Low 8 with temperature rising to 15 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or thunderstorms. High 20.
entry.summary: Showers or thunderstorms. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming south 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 20. Humidex 25. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Wind becoming west 30 km/h in the evening then light overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
